ul.li:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Live attenuated Ty21a vaccine scheduleLive attenuated Ty21a vaccine scheduleLive attenuated Ty21a vaccine schedule Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid

Clients age is less than 6 yearsToday's date − "Date of birth" < 6 yearsToday's date − "Date of birth" < 6 years Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Client is not due for Typhoid vaccination"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due""Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.TCV * Tabs: Typhoid
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid dose as clients age is less than 6 years.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Clients age is more than or equal to 6 yearsToday's date − "Date of birth" ≥ 6 yearsToday's date − "Date of birth" ≥ 6 years Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Client is due for Typhoid vaccination"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due""Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.TCV * Tabs: Typhoid
Prescribe the Ty21a primary series (if not done yet). Should vaccinate client with typhoid dose as primary series has not been completed and no live vaccines was administered in the past 4 weeks.Check for contraindications.Check for contraindications. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks.Check for other vaccines due and inform the caregiver or the client when the next dose should be administered.Check for other vaccines due and inform the caregiver or the client when the next dose should be administered. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Client is not due for typhoid booster dose"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due""Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid booster dose as the latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.ViPS * Tabs: Typhoid
Client is due for typhoid booster dose"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due""Immunization recommendation status" = "Due" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid
Prescribe the Ty21a booster series. Should vaccinate client with typhoid booster dose as primary series has been completed, the latest typhoid dose was administered more than 3 years ago and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks.Check for contraindications.Check for contraindications. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a * Tabs: Typhoid

title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.Ty21a. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: Clients age is less than 6 years
Client is not due for Typhoid vaccination
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid dose as clients age is less than 6 years.
Clients age is more than or equal to 6 years
Client is due for Typhoid vaccination
Prescribe the Ty21a primary series (if not done yet). Should vaccinate client with typhoid dose as primary series has not been completed and no live vaccines was administered in the past 4 weeks.
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks.
Client is not due for typhoid booster dose
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid booster dose as the latest typhoid dose was administered less than 3 years ago.
Client is due for typhoid booster dose

Prescribe the Ty21a booster series. Should vaccinate client with typhoid booster dose as primary series has been completed, the latest typhoid dose was administered more than 3 years ago and no live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks.
Should not vaccinate client with typhoid booster dose as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks.
